page.title: 01KINGSKETTLE/LADYBANK AREA
page.content: {Ladybank}and{Kingskettle}are situated in a quiet{rural}area in the fertile {Howe of Fife.There are woodland walks with a{picnic}area and also a few {public footpaths}through the woods.The {River Eden}is suitable for{trout fishing.For the more{energetic}there is the very popular{18 hole golf {course.It was used in the 1984 Open by {world famous}golfers.There are{2 {bowling greens,the one in Ladybank holdind{bi-monthly}tournaments.For the {younger generation}there are{3}parks {providing swings, roundabout, chute, {climbing frame,paddling pool and {football pitches.Older}people enjoy sitting in the{Memorial Gardens watching the{world}go by.There are{3 {small licensed}hotels providing snacks at lunch time.There is a{regular}train service from{Ladybank}and also a bus service from{both}towns.
